title: Im in love...
body:
Taric.

You were my favourite support pre-update, and now... you are outrageous in every way!

please don't be popular, i need you all to myself!

replies.body:
Here is to add into your hype

Best Taric login theme
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wlcN-Fa70ds
This is sooooo gooooood
Just beautiful!

He's been my favourite Top Laner since season one.

Fight me.

I know how you feel, except I don't want to play him but to gaze upon his flowing hair and strong chest. Crushing like a school girl.

Armor of the Fifth Age Taric is not shy.....
he is so much better, he blows kisses now too!!!

He blows my mind.

So glad that the fluffy pink leg warmers were retained. He's totally pulling them off like a boss now. No offense to old Taric but he did give the impression of having just escaped a mid 70's, very outrageous exercise video. But not before styling his hair by sticking a fork in a toaster.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EsfWIE5z,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-20T11:52:24.483+0000)
>
> Taric.
> 
> You were my favourite support pre-update, and now... you are outrageous in every way!
> 
> please don&#039;t be popular, i need you all to myself!

Haha, he's popular now. Too bad for you.

My friend used to be really into Taric, several months (maybe even about a year) ago. Me and him always had this thing where we'd go Taric/Kalista bot, and we'd (usually) be quite fabulous doing it. Since the update, we've gotten back into that "golden oldie" combo and, dare I say, it just feels natural (from the perspective of both support and ADC). This is something we're going to be using quite a lot, I feel.

https://media.giphy.com/media/Coy8cq59o5gOI/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EsfWIE5z,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-04-21T07:58:38.380+0000)
>
> Haha, he's popular now. Too bad for you.
> 
> My friend used to be really into Taric, several months (maybe even about a year) ago. Me and him always had this thing where we'd go Taric/Kalista bot, and we'd (usually) be quite fabulous doing it. Since the update, we've gotten back into that "golden oldie" combo and, dare I say, it just feels natural (from the perspective of both support and ADC). This is something we're going to be using quite a lot, I feel.
> 
> https://media.giphy.com/media/Coy8cq59o5gOI/giphy.gif

taric kalista was insane, me and a friend also did it when championship came out. w proc damage with taric's empowered autos is too much for any adc except graves

really interested to know on how KassTaric bot works.
btw, nice Poro King score, you satan! xD

I wonder what your rank will be if you play ranked
(pretty sure heartvine got banned for "3rd party programs")

I got banned because *apparently* I was hacking, except I wasn't. Took forever to convince Rito that me and my friend really are just that good.

XD

so unbanned again?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBGEG21CGo0

The Amor of the Fifth age {{champion:44}} though..

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

needs to be tweaked, i don't think tarics impact on the game was properly tested... His stun is stupid, works for you and a friend in range, has a charge up, so with a dash / flash / gap closer, can be done from fog, with your own nuke dmg on top of the stun... and not much can be done about it, and even if you do... well looky look... invulnerability for everyone! Why does riot release champs that are too strong? Is it really that its just for a quick month of sales before you tweak them down again?

The only thing they'll tweak on Taric now are damage numbers not duration timers.

Just because you think a champion is overpowered doesn't mean they are.
his stun went from nice 0.75/1/1.25/1.5/1.75 to a stupid odd 1/1.13/1.25/1.38/1.5 -.- i hate awkward numbers

I didnt mind his old duration as it was a single target stun, it was a mechanic that rewarded his aggressive tank style, get into the thick of it and you can disable alot... Not sit in brushes or fogs, prep a stun from fog anyone with a dash/cc that hasn't gone hard tank is virtually a garunteed kill, oh you may live once every 5mins if you have flash. 

Play defensively? Does it matter against 2 aoe stuns how you play under turret when you're stunned anyways. 

Tarics in game? "TEAM HAS TO BUY QSS {{item:3140}} OR GET CAMPED" - this is boring to be against and pretty much the only defense you'll get as a champ without an in built dash/dodge/gapcloser etc.
The stun is already pretty awkward with the wind up time, I can't see those numbers really going through.

I don't say it lightly and it's after much consideration. 

How is an ability that is not an ultimate, that is aoe... a stun, given to you and a friend that effectively can stun an entire team unless you're really spread out reasonable? Especially on people like Dianna, Yi, Lee Sin etc... Hope you enjoy getting aoe stunned by a JG with taric next to him before you ever know whats happening. 

It's a game mechanic that needs tweaking. 

Riot ALWAYS does this in changes...

Changing somehting? Lets just make it strong so we make a ton of $ from flavor of the month players. and then tweak it down on month two. 

This has always been the case with champ releases.

It's not at all that powerful.
It has a long wind up time and very easy to see where it is and where it will effect.

Riot don't intentionally make new champions overpowered to make money on their release.
Hell how are they supposed to with a rework?

Everyone has Taric, he's a what 350RP champ, and his skins are just as cheap.
If you've played LoL for more than a year you probably already have Taric.
Was the same with Sion, everyone already had Sion, he isn't OP at all, and wasn't on re-release either.

What does happen however is that the PBE and internal testing is the worst possible place to actually know how to balance a champion or item from.
The people who work at Riot aren't great at playing the game, the highest ranked Rioter I've ever heard of is Gold.
The people on the PBE Server don't have a MMR/Ranking System and it's nothing but a mixed cluster fuck for finding bugs and hardly any insight on what balance should be like.

You can only balance a champion/item on the live data from the world environment.

People say Morgana's Q is overpowered, but those same people also think that it's a stun when in fact it is a root.

Sorry mate, but you're Unranked and only seem to play ARAM, so you really don't have any clue what balance is.

My old account was from launch till lucien release, Diamond 2 NA. 

This account is only 6 weeks old, if you've read any of my posts, i've made this clear numerous times in multiple threads. I took a hiatus from league, remade an account and started playing.

For someone read to shut my lack of knowledge down you seem to miss the obvious point. It's not his LANE stunning that is retarded, its his ability to roam / aoe stun from no where via Brush and Fog. You miss the point entirely, it's synergy with team is too strong... Pair it with Dianna, Lee Sin, Shaco, Evelynn etc.... Unless you're entire team has your 1/3rd of the map warded, you will eventually get camped by taric and friend in fog/brush and stunned before you can do anything.

Trying to attack my credibility is just immature. I'm almost certain i could bring up more knowledge of the games history and lore than you if i really wanted to. 

This isn't a pissing contest or to see who's bigger. 

To make it clear again, i dont do ranked for two reasons at present- im on a bit of a potato, some team fights can drop me down to 25fps and freeze for a split second or two... Not the biggest impact, but can be frustrating at crucial moments. 2nd reason being, this account recently only just got to 30, why would i be playing ranked without 3/4 complete dedicated rune pages for roles? Tanking, fighters, ap's, adc's? it's obvious with my mix of runes i literally just bought the on special cheapies and, fixing around some t2 runes till i can build up the RP and WANT to dump a good 11-12k ip on it... 420 a rune, x9 per section, x3 + 3 quints... averagng 1050 a quint, not for speciality like crit damage etc. 

Quick to abuse me, not so quick to use that head for logical application. Sion is reasonably balanced, to be honest i think he's one of the more fun bruiser/tanky type that actually has fun mash up fight mechanics that has a balance of CC and damage without the CC turning good damage into extraordinary damage, however, Sion can only come out of no where with his ulti, taric can just use some move speed fog and brush and your dead without an escape or tanky items, which come mid/late anyways, your 1 tanky item won't really save you.

Only play aram? Hmmm yesterday was based off the fact of what? You checked my night history? Actually i play mostly the rift, but when medication kicks in and my head starts swimming i switch to aram as its less disappointing on teammates if i cant really focus (in which case i take a break after). Yesterday, since you want to know my life and abuse me lack of knowledge (which is clear your lack of knowledge of me is more of a missmatch than my views on taric), i was in a car accident yesterday where my 4wd was the meat in a car sandwich, i was pain killered through the eyeballs and in no way wanted to focus on the rift.

But hey, with all your knowledge, this is just me telling you something you obviously already know right? Cause i assume i know everything about you at a glance. 

I use morgana, i dont think her Q is over powered at all, its a skill shot root. I know its not a stun, her ultimate is a stun, her Q is a snare, which you W over... 

Stop thinking condescending attitudes are how you teach or inform people, or how to make yourself look better online. It really isn't, you look like a twat.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EsfWIE5z,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-04-21T17:18:11.312+0000)
>
> It's not at all that powerful.
> It has a long wind up time and very easy to see where it is and where it will effect.
> 
> Riot don't intentionally make new champions overpowered to make money on their release.
> Hell how are they supposed to with a rework?
> 
> Everyone has Taric, he's a what 350RP champ, and his skins are just as cheap.
> If you've played LoL for more than a year you probably already have Taric.
> Was the same with Sion, everyone already had Sion, he isn't OP at all, and wasn't on re-release either.
> 
> What does happen however is that the PBE and internal testing is the worst possible place to actually know how to balance a champion or item from.
> The people who work at Riot aren't great at playing the game, the highest ranked Rioter I've ever heard of is Gold.
> The people on the PBE Server don't have a MMR/Ranking System and it's nothing but a mixed cluster fuck for finding bugs and hardly any insight on what balance should be like.
> 
> You can only balance a champion/item on the live data from the world environment.
> 
> People say Morgana's Q is overpowered, but those same people also think that it's a stun when in fact it is a root.
> 
> Sorry mate, but you're Unranked and only seem to play ARAM, so you really don't have any clue what balance is.

I never once abused you, I have no idea where you are getting that from.
I'm not speaking in a condescending fashion at all, I simply talk in a direct point form as I hate conventional social structure that slows getting to the point.
The only one being hostile here is you.

You've no proof to your claim of being Diamond 2 on NA, if you were why are you not using that account to post? There is no reason at all to create another account unless if the original was banned, and even then you can still post on the forums with it and it would have the history of being Diamond in order to keep the status of your claim.
Myself I am currently Silver 1 with mid range Gold MMR and I have no intention of climbing higher than Gold. I have no need to prove myself, there are plenty of video recording from myself playing on Australian streams with some of our best OPL players and Diamond/Challenger players.
As a scientist in real life, I have amazing analytical skills and can easily put them to use in LoL, I could very easy put down your claims that you have more knowledge about the game than myself, but really anyone can do that considering we are communicating through the internet, a resource that lets us make sure we are always correct within seconds.
So that's nothing more than a pissing contest that you want to start for the sake of starting a pissing contest, and you're the one calling me a twat.

Your initial claims were that Taric was made overpowered/strong on purpose as to gain increased profit from champion and skin sales with is a very abusive claim to make to begin with.
There are far stronger abilities than Taric's new stun in the game. It's not at all like when Nidalee's Q could turn invisible.
It really doesn't cover that much ground, and a team shouldn't be grouped tightly together that it would effect them greatly to begin with.
At max it is currently 1.75 seconds, with a 3 second wind up before hand that greatly telegraphs that it is coming.
Having watched around 15-20 hours of gameplay of the new Taric so far, I don't see it being anywhere near as significant as you claim it is.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EsfWIE5z,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-21T18:14:04.198+0000)
>
> I never once abused you, I have no idea where you are getting that from.

havent read past this... but here...

Sorry mate, but you're Unranked and only seem to play ARAM, so you really don't have any clue what balance is.

That's not abuse, it's a direct statement based on what information there is on your account.
And as it stands, you will be judged on your account.

Every Bronze/Unranked player has a Diamond/Master/Challenger smurf.
End of the day your claims are no different as you have no way of proving that your other account existed as your account.
And I don't see how you expect to ever be taken seriously with a pathetic name like that.

As for your claims of synergy with Taric roaming like that, it'll never happen, you'll never see it happen. Except for maybe one instance in a professional tournament, and it wont be talked about for more than two minutes at the analyst's desk.
Preconceived judgement without factual knowledge is a form of abuse and intimidation. You're assumptions are incorrect in every way with my knowledge of the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EsfWIE5z,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-21T18:14:04.198+0000)

> You've no proof to your claim of being Diamond 2 on NA, if you were why are you not using that account to post? There is no reason at all to create another account unless if the original was banned, and even then you can still post on the forums with it and it would have the history of being Diamond in order to keep the status of your claim.

> As a scientist in real life, I have amazing analytical skills and can easily put them to use in LoL, I could very easy put down your claims that you have more knowledge about the game than myself, but really anyone can do that considering we are communicating through the internet, a resource that lets us make sure we are always correct within seconds.

> 
> Your initial claims were that Taric was made overpowered/strong on purpose as to gain increased profit from champion and skin sales with is a very abusive claim to make to begin with.
> There are far stronger abilities than Taric's new stun in the game. It's not at all like when Nidalee's Q could turn invisible.
> It really doesn't cover that much ground, and a team shouldn't be grouped tightly together that it would effect them greatly to begin with.
> At max it is currently 1.75 seconds, with a 3 second wind up before hand that greatly telegraphs that it is coming.
> Having watched around 15-20 hours of gameplay of the new Taric so far, I don't see it being anywhere near as significant as you claim it is.

I will start judging you on what you have presented me, this account was not the d2 one, i've even posted it in other threads about a month ago with what happened, i quit when lucien release was out, left my account open to friends to use as it had virtually every thing to date unlocked. Returned about 6 weeks ago as i said, found it banned. Shrugged, made this one. Long story short anyways. Sorry, didn't keep a League Portfolio of all my achievements as you know, most game accounts have a tracking method built in... totally my bad, should have planned for this. However, you still fail to see what i'm saying... support taric in lane isn't so bad an issue, its the synergy when roaming with dash/gap closing/stealth heros. The stun can be prepared before the characters are visible. And im not talking about things like "don't facecheck bush brah, you'll get eaten" im talking, you can get stunned doing krugs from  stun preped from the river tribrush bot if you're smart with timing/move speed, flash, using a dash to close/hit champ... and .1 after BOOM AOESTUN. 

How do you not see the logic of what i've been saying from the first post? You're comparing apples and orangles... Yes they're both fruit...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBGEG21CGo0

Damn 
Taric is so damn sexy
So freaking smexy
I just 
want to
play using him

I'm practicing him a lot, as I really like him
I have to get use to the fact that tarics ult takes 3 freaking seconds to actually be used.
So burst mages/Assassins counter taric I guess.

But Ive done so much, as I would charge dazzle, and flash stun the enemy adc and we would kill them.
(I have to work on aiming, when trying to predict encounters)
I wish bastion gave the one I bastioned bonus Armor, but apart from that I like it a lot.

I feel like I have to run mana/mana regen runes and/or masteries tho, as compared to other supports he uses up a lot of mana, for healing, shielding and stunning enemies for poke/finishers.
Looking forward to giving him a run
Haha
